casebody.data:
Persis S. WIDERMANN, Appellant, v. Elliott L. RICHARDSON, Secretary of Health, Education and Welfare, Appellee. No. 144, Docket 71-1777.

(Reporting Services Requested to Publish Headnote Only.)

United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Argued Oct. 19, 1971. Decided Nov. 10, 1971.

Before MEDINA, MANSFIELD and MULLIGAN, Circuit Judges.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
